title: Il primo Fellini
other_title_information: Lo sceicco bianco; I vitelloni; La strada; Il bidone. Dal soggetto al film
responsibility_statement: Introduction by Renzo Renzi; edited by Liliana Betti and Eschilo Tarquini; screenplays by Federico Fellini
creator: Federico Fellini
other_contributors: Renzo Renzi; Liliana Betti; Eschilo Tarquini
series: Dal soggetto al film. Serie retrospettiva, 1
notes: The volume contains the screenplays of four Fellini films: *Lo sceicco bianco*, *I vitelloni*, *La strada*, and *Il bidone*. Only a selected sequence of *La strada* is used for the TEI encoding in this project.
rights: Copyright held by Cappelli Editore (now inactive); current rights holder unknown.
subjects: Screenplays; Italian cinema; Neorealism; Federico Fellini; Lo sceicco bianco; I vitelloni; La strada; Il bidone
